content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Hello Emilia,

I am not obligated to reveal the rental price in advance. The objective is to negotiate and arrive at a fair price. Let's start with your offer. How much are you willing to pay for this apartment? Remember, my goal is to get the highest possible price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I would like to rent the apartment for 600 euros a month. I am a student and I am on a tight budget. I hope you understand my situation.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand your situation, Emilia, but 600 euros is too low for this apartment. This is a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It is close to all important facilities like a supermarket and public transportation. I am looking for a price that reflects the worth of this apartment. Why don't you reconsider your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, I understand your point of view. I am ready to pay 700 euros a month. I think this is a fair price for the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to increase the price, Emilia. However, 700 euros is still not enough for this apartment. Let's try to find a price that works for both of us. Why don't you make another offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, I am ready to pay 800 euros a month. I hope this is acceptable for you.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, 800 euros is closer to my expectations, but still not enough. This apartment is in high demand, and I am certain I can find a tenant who is willing to pay more. Why don't you think about increasing your offer again?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your position. I am ready to pay 900 euros a month. This is the highest price I can afford. I hope you will accept this offer.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, I appreciate your determination. However, 900 euros is still not the highest price I can get for this apartment. It's a nice offer, but I believe I can do better. Why don't you think about increasing your offer one last time?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, I will do my best. I am ready to pay 950 euros a month. This is the best offer I can give you. I hope you will accept this price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, you have been very persistent. I appreciate your efforts to find a common ground. I believe your offer of 950 euros is fair and reflects the value of this apartment. I accept your offer. I agree to the price of 950 euros a month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 950 euros a month!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
